root.name: Party Pigs: Farmyard Games
root.description: GameplayParty Pigs Farmyard Gamesis a mini-game compendium that includes crazy versions of sports such as:HammerJavelinRunningHurdlesDivingLong JumpHigh JumpSwimmingThe game is centered around aAnnual Party Pigs Track Fieldcompetition where the player must compete to be the best Party Pig.The game allows up to 4 players to compete head to head in any of these games.

similar_games.game: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games
Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games
